item.title: Initial Commit
item.description: There is no starting or stopping, only doing

item.title: About
item.description: Aleksey (Oleksii) Potapov is iOS Developer, professionally developing iOS apps since 2013. Contacts E-mail: ing.aleksey.potapov@gmail.com LinkedIn Github Stackoverflow Twitter Medium Codementor Story Starting in 2012, iOS development became for me something like a hobby. Years come, on summer 2013 I started my career at Mobindustry Corp. making fitness application, festival app and other outsourcing applications. Thanks to National Mining University program I had a chance to attend the summer school at Koblenz-Landau University, this opportunity influenced on choice to move somewhere else, where I could continue develop myself as a person.

item.title: Career
item.description: Sygic iOS Developer — Aug 2017 - present Company website Sygic GPS & Car Navigation My responsibility: Apple CarPlay integration 3rd party frameworks integration: Bosch MySpin, SmartDeviceLink, Pioneer SDK SwiftLint integration Car Connectivity logic migration from app to app Objective-C to Swift migration Features: Navigation, CoreLocation, Objective-C, Swift, RxSwift, MVVM, BLE Official website Onlia Sense My responsibility: Complete iOS app solution in a team of two developers Sygic Navigation SDK for iOS integration Business logic Various custom UI elements Features: RxSwift, MVVM, Firebase, Twilio
